comments.body: I just reproduced it on Windows 2000 (Tomcat 5.0.3, JDK 1.4.1_03).
Fixed now in the CVS and should appear in 5.0.10.

description:
I can't Copy&Paste text strings from the Console Monitor application (Apache 
Service Monitor) to any other application. The Copy&Paste buffer seems to be 
empty.
summary: Copy & Paste doesn't work (Apache Service Monitor)
